snippet: After meeting with President Salva Kiir of South Sudan, President Omar al-Bashir of Sudan said oil from South Sudan would continue to flow through his country’s pipelines.
abstract: Sudanese Pres Omar al-Bashir says, after meeting with President Salva Kiir of South Sudan, that oil from South Sudan will continue to flow through his country’s pipelines to South Sudan; Bashir had ordered pipelines closed and accused South Sudan of supporting rebel movements in Sudan.
lead_paragraph: After meeting with President Salva Kiir of South Sudan, President Omar al-Bashir of Sudan said oil from South Sudan would continue to flow through his country’s pipelines.
